text: François Dupeyron (14 August 195025 February 2016) was a French movie director and screenwriter. He directed 17 movies since his career began in 1977. His movie La Chambre des officiers was entered into the 2001 Cannes Film Festival. He was born in Tartas, Landes, France. Dupeyron died in Paris from a heart attack on 25 February 2016. He was aged 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French movie actors Category:French screenwriters
title: François Dupeyron
